Traffic

An overview on the traffic trends of flights in the EUROCONTROL area (network view).

This page provides an overview of the traffic, ATFM delay, punctuality (OTP15) and percentage of operated schedules in the EUROCONTROL Area. For a more detailed analysis consult our Daily traffic variation dashboard. Information on en-route and terminal service units from the Central Route Charges Office of EUROCONTROL (CRCO) is available from our Service Units dashboard.

  • Flights
  • ATFM Delays
  • Punctuality
